headline: AutoZone buys former Rite Aid store in Lima
summary: LIMA — AutoZone recently purchased the former Rite Aid store on Lima’s Robb Avenue, with plans to open its largest auto parts store in Lima in June or July. AutoZone Development LLC, of Memphis, Tenn., purchased the property at 302 W. Robb Ave., Lima, for $2.2 million from 302 West Robb LLC, a Parsippany, N.J., company, on Jan. 8. Superior Plus Realtors, of Lima, had the listing. “It will be a ...
